gameDetails.name: Summoner Wars (Second Edition): High Elves Faction Deck
gameDetails.description:
Valeria the Just and her High Elves tirelessly persecute the unrepentant who wield Itharia's magic for their own corrupt purposes.

Behold as Valeria calls upon holy laws that alter the rules of engagement! Both sides must obey those laws, yet only the High Elves seem to find them a blessing...
